pullrequest.title: Abstract message types so protobuf is not explicit in the msgs API

content.raw:
Thanks, I merged that in.

As I look more closely, I see `google::protobuf::` types in quite a few header files:
~~~
$ grep -rlI google::protobuf . | grep hh$
./gazebo/gui/ConfigWidget.hh
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.hh
./gazebo/gui/viewers/TextView.hh
./gazebo/msgs/MsgFactory.hh
./gazebo/transport/CallbackHelper.hh
./gazebo/transport/Node.hh
./gazebo/transport/Publisher.hh
./gazebo/transport/SubscribeOptions.hh
./gazebo/transport/TopicManager.hh
./gazebo/transport/TransportIface.hh
./gazebo/transport/TransportTypes.hh
~~~

[MsgFactory.hh](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e35441b487971348c459f693fb604068e05aafbd/gazebo/msgs/MsgFactory.hh?at=msgs_abstract) is tricky because it doesn't include `MessageTypes.hh`, which is where I added the typedef for `gazebo::msgs::Message`. We would need a separate header file for just the typedefs...
content.html:
Thanks, I merged that in.

As I look more closely, I see google::protobuf:: types in quite a few header files:

$ grep -rlI google::protobuf . | grep hh$
./gazebo/gui/ConfigWidget.hh
./gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.hh
./gazebo/gui/viewers/TextView.hh
./gazebo/msgs/MsgFactory.hh
./gazebo/transport/CallbackHelper.hh
./gazebo/transport/Node.hh
./gazebo/transport/Publisher.hh
./gazebo/transport/SubscribeOptions.hh
./gazebo/transport/TopicManager.hh
./gazebo/transport/TransportIface.hh
./gazebo/transport/TransportTypes.hh

MsgFactory.hh is tricky because it doesn't include MessageTypes.hh, which is where I added the typedef for gazebo::msgs::Message. We would need a separate header file for just the typedefs...
